message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. We believe in fair value exchange, and considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $120 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We understand your valuation of the product. In light of this, we would like to propose a price of $110 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $100. I'd be willing to pay $105 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, we would like to propose a price of $107 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'd be willing to pay $105 for the product.
We understand your budget constraints, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to accept an offer of $106 for the product.
